message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm hoping to keep my budget under $120. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $120?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraint, and I'm willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, would it be possible for us to agree on a price of $120?
Hi Bob, I'm still willing to work with you, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $125.
I understand your position, Alice. My final offer is to purchase the product for $120. I hope we can come to an agreement.
